summary:
Remus: What should we do with our day off? 
Sirius: Oh! Let's go to one of those liquid zoos? 
Remus: Do... do you mean an...
body:
Remus: What should we do with our day off?

Sirius: Oh! Let’s go to one of those liquid zoos?

Remus: Do… do you mean an aquarium?

Sirius: YEAH! LET’S GO! LET’S DO THAT!

blog.name: ao3feed-tomarrymort
blog.title: Tomarrymort On AO3
blog.description: An automated feed for the Tom/Harry and Voldemort/Harry AO3 tags. Not a fic recs blog.

title: Game Over, Try Again
description:
by A_Perverted_Romance_Addict

Even after Ana Potter learns the truth about herself, her connection to Voldemort and Dumbledore’s manipulations, she still goes to the Forbidden Forest to die, if only to end the war and bring Voldemort a step closer to mortality.

She doesn’t know what to expect after death, but she certainly didn’t expect to find herself in a blinding white representation of King’s Cross and she definitely didn’t expect to find herself caring for Voldemort’s soul shard inside her or the fact that she would encounter Death and find out she was now his ‘Mistress’.

After a nice chat with Death, she strikes a deal with him: He would send her nine months into the past with the soul shard to change the course of the war and prevent as many premature deaths as possible.

However, the only way to bring it with her is by giving it its own body and carrying it for the following nine months inside her womb.

Words: , Chapters: 1/20, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Second Chances

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Tom Riddle | Voldemort, Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger, Severus Snape, Remus Lupin, Death (Harry Potter), Life - Character, Time, Magic - Character, Destiny - Character, Chaos - Character, Destruction - Character, Peace - Character, Other(s)
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Voldemort, Harry Potter/Tom Riddle | Voldemort, Hermione Granger/Ron Weasley, Remus Lupin/Severus Snape
  • Additional Tags: Female Harry Potter, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Voldemort Wins, Time Travel Fix-It, Teen Pregnancy, baby Horcrux, May/December Relationship, Enemies to Friends to Lovers, Marriage of Convenience, Master of Death Harry Potter, Immortal Harry Potter, Sane Voldemort (Harry Potter), Headmaster Voldemort, DADA Professor Voldemort, Father Voldemort, Mother Harry Potter, Master of Life Voldemort, Possessive Voldemort (Harry Potter), Romance, Eventual Smut, Fluff and Humor, Comedy, Romantic Comedy, With a Pinch of Angst and Drama, Virgin Harry, Virgin Voldemort

summary:
Draco: You want me to fail, dont you?
Harry: Nop, I want to kiss you
Draco: Right now when I'm studying?
Harry: You're so busy...
body:
Draco: You want me to fail, dont you?
Harry: Nop, I want to kiss you
Draco: Right now when I'm studying?
Harry: You're so busy lately that it's that or when you're in the shower
Draco: So then why do you always bother me when I'm studying? I want those showers, Potter!

blog.name: lippskinn
blog.title: Harry Potter Meta
blog.description: Magical Midnight Readings from the Fathomless Fandom Pit

body:
Magic 101

James: Going on missions with Mad-Eye is amazing! That guy is an evil genius.

Remus: I don’t know. I feel like his little apprentice every time we have a mission.

Sirius: Isn’t that the point? I mean that guy can really teach you something.

Remus: Yeah but he’s also a trained auror and I’m not so I’m not pretending.

Peter: It’s like going to war with a rock in your hand and thinking, if I throw this stone hard enough and aim really well, then I might win this thing.

tags: i know the plaid shirt isn't very rock concerty
i went for an older more dadly bill that day xD
title: Putting the B in LGBT
body:
“Bill was — there was no other word for it — cool. He was tall, with long hair that he had tied back in a ponytail. He was wearing an earring with what looked like a fang dangling from it. Bill’s clothes would not have looked out of place at a rock concert, except that Harry recognized his boots to be made, not of leather, but of dragon hide.”

- Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire


(ooc: Bill was Harry’s bisexual awakening and paved the way for his swooning over Cedric and that’s the tea.)

reblog.comment:

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary:
UNLIKELY PLACES

 they are gathered one by one and then in droves: muggles, and soon squibs and muggleborns and anyone else...
caption:
UNLIKELY PLACES

they are gathered one by one and then in droves: muggles, and soon squibs and muggleborns and anyone else vulnerable to the ire of the death eaters. hidden away in safehouses across wizarding britain, protected by the order of the phoenix or by individual witches and wizards trying to do the right thing, they all stand on shaky ground, and nowhere is truly safe.

this and more on halys, a member-driven au marauders jcink premium site, set in 1981 at the height of the first wizarding war. we are now celebrating six months open - it’s the perfect time to join our community!

→ INDEX | GUIDEBOOK | CANON LIST | REQUESTS | SUBPLOT: SAFEHOUSE NETWORK

summary: William Nott - OPEN  Faction: Death Eaters War is messy, something that William Nott has always hated. Despite agreeing with...
caption:
William Nott - OPEN
Faction: Death Eaters

War is messy, something that William Nott has always hated. Despite agreeing with their views, joining the Death Eaters has never been something he’s really wanted. It is too dangerous, too unclean. But pressures from his Pureblood family pushed him to take the Dark Mark and though he fears where it will lead him, he’s taken to Lord Voldemort’s cause with the same cleverness and eloquence that he applies to everything in his life.

Nott is not just a Death Eater, he’s a writer, a creator of stories, but the one that must be told now is his own. Will you be the one to write it?

-

CRIMSON BEGINNING - A psychological horror Harry Potter roleplay

For the intrepid and curious we offer:

  • Highly literate, and para-centric role-play
  • Dark and complicated themes (these plots are not for the faint of heart)
  • A steady paced, active, and fun-filled environment
  • A safe place to brainstorm or bounce ideas

Home || Rules || Apply || Navigation || FAQs

War is messy, something that William Nott has always hated. Despite agreeing with their views, joining the Death Eaters has never been something he’s really wanted. It is too dangerous, too unclean. But pressures from his Pureblood family pushed him to take the Dark Mark and though he fears where it will lead him, he’s taken to Lord Voldemort’s cause with the same cleverness and eloquence that he applies to everything in his life.

Nott is not just a Death Eater, he’s a writer, a creator of stories, but the one that must be told now is his own. Will you be the one to write it?

-

CRIMSON BEGINNING - A psychological horror Harry Potter roleplay

For the intrepid and curious we offer:

  • Highly literate, and para-centric role-play
  • Dark and complicated themes (these plots are not for the faint of heart)
  • A steady paced, active, and fun-filled environment
  • A safe place to brainstorm or bounce ideas

Home || Rules || Apply || Navigation || FAQs

blog.name: lady-black-universe
blog.title: All Lady Black
blog.description: A 14 year old hp fanfic writer who wants to show her love of hp and literature to the world

title: A tribute to the Marauders
body:
Years have passed and times have changed. We were young, we were careless, we were bold. 4 friends joined together and became inseparable. A stubborn stag, a loyal dog, an innocent werewolf and a slippery rat. Together they wrecked chaos at Hogwarts. Pranks were done, enemies were challenged, love was proclaimed, secrets were sought out and solutions were found. Our friendship went from strength to strength.

We had our laughs, our pranks and our times. Every happy memory we had together. Sons were disowned, graduation took place, careers began, wars had started but we never left each other sides. Among the darkness, there was happiness and hope. the next line of us began. We had our happiness but only for a  moment.

Prophecies came about, secrets were shared. Friends were betrayed, lives were sacrificed. A friend was lost, a kid was orphaned, grief took place. We were heartbroken, we were broken, we were enraged. Mistakes were repeated, hearts were shattered, a friend was abandoned, rage replaced grief, anger took over us, accusations were made, innocents were blamed, souls were sucked and imprisoned and we were separated. we realized that happiness never lasts forever.

one was dead, the other a traitor. Only 2 were left. A werewolf grieving, an innocent convict. There was sadness, there was misery, there was darkness. Days felt like months, months felt like years. A soul was left empty, a friend was left broken. Both struggling with the truth. Both wishing for time to stop. 12 years of being heartbroken and still not yet healed. Who knew pain could hurt so much?

Then things changed. Depression became desperation. Desperation became determination. A new spark. The traitor was back. A new motive. The determination was fuelled by rage, A convict escaped in the search for justice, a friend became a professor. Truths were revealed, friends were reunited, a traitor was captured. A werewolf took form in the light of a full moon, traitors escaped, time was reversed, lives were saved, godson met godfather, promises to meet again were made. We were stubborn and nothing was over yet.

A professor resigned, the ministry was tricked, a convict in hiding and stuck in grim old places. The past came back to us haunt us, old family feuds and punishments renewed, stuck in hateful places. Dealing with loss, dealing with pain, painful accusations filling our head. No matter how much you want it to end, the past never leaves you; we learnt that the hard way.

Getting tired of old ways, sitting in the darkness, reminded of past mistakes and regret. Wanting to feel the sunshine, needing to be free. Caged and hopeless. We were lost, we were broken, we were tired. We didn’t know life would get so bad. Then godson got in trouble, ready for an adventure, rules were broken, godson was saved. Cousins met and became rivals and battles took place. Back into the game, the adrenaline pumping through our veins, we felt alive once again, reminded of old times. then that feeling came crashing, struck square in the chest, falling through a veil, greiving godsons and racing friends. Godsons left behind, promises to be a family were broken, lost never to be fulfilled. One’s journy came to an end, engulfed in darkness.

Another dead. One was left. The last of us. Struggling. Pain. Defeat. Sitting alone with no one left, remembering. Remembering friends, adventures, pranks. Outside he was alright, inside he was broken. A grieving werewolf left alone in this world. Love was proclaimed, love was rejected. The war had begun once again. Missions took place. Attacks were fought. Love was confronted, love was embraced. still coping with the past and present, with no idea for the future.

The war continued to rage. A leader fell. The world was in darkness. Up to kids to save what was left. History repeats itself. A war, children fighting, loved ones lost. Once again amongst the darkness, a bundle of joy. The next generation of us continued to grow. Tiny happiness amongst a  vast sea of misery.

Hogwarts attacked, ready to defend our last home, wand at the ready. Son left at home, won’t let our home fall, the last memory of us, won’t let them be victorious. For him, for us, for future generations. A battle continued. One fighting alone, love was attacked, must defend. A brave man falls from the light. A son was orphaned, the last of us gone.

Years have passed, times have changed but we were never happy for long. Our dreams were crushed, our souls shattered. We were 21 and the world came crashing at our feet. We were children fighting in a war. we thought we would outlive it, that we would emerge victoriously. We thought we would never be broken apart but faith seemed to have other plans. We fought valiantly, through the war and through the pain. We made our mistakes, we made our accusations, we were broken. We may have died young but we died boldly, we died brave, we died leaving our marks on others. We wanted to be remembered and we always will be through our pranks, our laughs and through the memories of others. We are the Marauders. 3 Geniuses and a rat. Purveyors of Aid for Magical Mischief Makers.

Raise your wands for those who deserved happiness.

blog.name: aesthetics-for-harry-potter
blog.title: Moodboards for Harry Potter
blog.description: Blog created on July 15, 2018. Just two young women in love with the Harry Potter series. Ravenclaw and Slytherin, respectively. {REQUESTS ARE CLOSED}
